pageContext.claim: “As far as the caravan, which is very dangerous -- you see what's been happening -- as far as the caravan is concerned, our military is out. We have about 5,800. We'll go up anywhere between 10,000 and 15,000 military personnel, on top of Border Patrol, ICE, and everybody else at the border. Nobody is coming in.”
pageContext.analysis: 5,200 active duty troops were deployed to the U.S.-Mexico border. Trump regularly suggests those troops can stop the caravan, but they are legally limited in the actions they can take.
